opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Federal Election Commission v. Nra Political Victory Fund

opinion:
510 U.S. 1190

Federal Election Commission
v.
NRA Political Victory Fund et al.

No. 93-1151.

Supreme Court of United States.

March 21, 1994.

1

Appeal from the C. A. D. C. Cir.

2

The Solicitor General is invited to file a brief in this case expressing the views of the United States with respect to the following question: "Whether the Federal Election Commission has statutory authority to represent itself in this case in this Court?" JUSTICE GINSBURG took no part in the consideration or decision of this order.
